name: The Curse of Shapeshifting: A Journey Through the Amazon
name_original: The Curse of Shapeshifting: A Journey Through the Amazon
description: In this educational adventure game set in the Amazon rainforest, you play as a shapeshifter searching for a magical idol that can break the curse of endless uncontrollable shapeshifting. Along the way, you encounter a variety of obstacles and creatures unique to the jungle. As you progress, you must use your shapeshifting abilities to navigate through the dense foliage and uncover the secrets of the rainforest. Can you find the idol, or will you be trapped forever in a never-ending cycle of transformation? Journey deep into the heart of the jungle in this exciting game full of mystery and intrigue.
